title: Riot Please Read. Change to when you can first play ranked.
body:
As a player who regularly finds interest in playing ranked games, I'v come to the point where i hit times where i despise playing league, due to there being no control of who can enter the ranked system and what lanes they can enter or champions they can play.. 
I constantly tilt from abusive players who afk or intentionally cost the game.

My suggestion To a Way of improving these problems the ranked lobby faces and making the game much more enjoyable for those who want to test there skills in a fair game as a team is as follows.

**Requirement to unlock.**
- Champions cannot be played in a ranked lobby unless level 5 mastery of champion is obtained. 
- Players must obtain a 20 Game Streak without Leaving the game, _(Resets If player leaves the game, and receives 5  or more reports for afking.)_
- 50 games in each role in team builder must be played _( To give players the ability to function in all roles, before they attempt to play ranked. )_

**Changes to how afks effect a players game**
- Teams who start a game with a dc for the first 15mins, Are rewarded double points if victory, and lose 1/2 
(Opposing Team gain half / lose normal points)

**Blocking future games**
- Give players the ability to, like or dislike team mates, 
 = Liking a team mate will increase the chances of playing with them again
 = disliking them, will Not pair you on the same team for 1 week.
